info.title: Huuray API
info.description: Huuray API for B2B customers (last updated 2023)

get.description: The amount of available balances on the B2B account in minor units with currency

parameters.name: X-API-NONCE
parameters.description:
A random value that you have not used earlier. (max 50 characters)
(this prevents your message from being re-transmitted, and thereby also replay attacks)

parameters.name: X-API-HASH
parameters.description:
The SHA512 hash of a concatenated string containing the following: ( API-SECRET + MD5(CONTENT) + NONCE ).
(this is used to obscure your API-SECRET while still authenticating you, and it also prevents the payload from getting tampered with en-route)

delete.summary: Used to Cancel Orders or Giftcards.

parameters.name: X-API-NONCE
parameters.description:
A random value that you have not used earlier. (max 50 characters)
(this prevents your message from being re-transmitted, and thereby also replay attacks)

parameters.name: X-API-HASH
parameters.description:
The SHA512 hash of a concatenated string containing the following: ( API-SECRET + MD5(CONTENT) + NONCE ).
(this is used to obscure your API-SECRET while still authenticating you, and it also prevents the payload from getting tampered with en-route)

post.summary: Used to get a list of the available products
post.description: The list will include both texts and images. It will also include your currently available discount if "All" is set to "False")

parameters.name: X-API-NONCE
parameters.description:
A random value that you have not used earlier. (max 50 characters)
(this prevents your message from being re-transmitted, and thereby also replay attacks)

parameters.name: X-API-HASH
parameters.description:
The SHA512 hash of a concatenated string containing the following: ( API-SECRET + MD5(CONTENT) + NONCE ).
(this is used to obscure your API-SECRET while still authenticating you, and it also prevents the payload from getting tampered with en-route)

post.description: The giftcards will be sent out as redeemable links. They will be sent out automatically via Email or SMS, or returned in a callback if you have set one up and enabled this feature.

parameters.name: X-API-NONCE
parameters.description:
A random value that you have not used earlier. (max 50 characters)
(this prevents your message from being re-transmitted, and thereby also replay attacks)

parameters.name: X-API-HASH
parameters.description:
The SHA512 hash of a concatenated string containing the following: ( API-SECRET + MD5(CONTENT) + NONCE ).
(this is used to obscure your API-SECRET while still authenticating you, and it also prevents the payload from getting tampered with en-route)

post.description: The giftcards will be returned in the API response, and returned in a callback if you have set one up and enabled this feature.

parameters.name: X-API-NONCE
parameters.description:
A random value that you have not used earlier. (max 50 characters)
(this prevents your message from being re-transmitted, and thereby also replay attacks)

parameters.name: X-API-HASH
parameters.description:
The SHA512 hash of a concatenated string containing the following: ( API-SECRET + MD5(CONTENT) + NONCE ).
(this is used to obscure your API-SECRET while still authenticating you, and it also prevents the payload from getting tampered with en-route)

Balance.description: The Available Balance in minor units

Master.description: An option that shows whether the Currency is a Master currency

BalanceResponse.title: Available balance Response

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

BalanceResponse.description: The response containing available balances with currency

CancelRequest.title: Cancel Request

OrderID.description: The ID of the Order you want to Cancel from

VoucherID.description: The ID of the specific Voucher in the given Order that you want to Cancel. If null is given, we will attempt to Cancel the entire Order.

CancelRequest.description: An object containing all the necessary information for Canceling giftcards

CancelResponse.title: Cancel Response

VoucherStatus.description: A list statuses for the individual Vouchers in the order, after the Cancel attempt.

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

CancelResponse.description: The response from a Cancel request

CatalogueRequest.title: Product Catalogue Request

All.description: Set this option to true to fetch the entire product catalog, false to limit the search to the products that your account has access to.

CatalogueRequest.description: An object containing the required input for the product catalogue API

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

OrderBuyer.title: Buyer (Order)

Postal.description: The postal code of the buyers address

City.description: The city of the buyers address

Email.description: The email address of the buyer

Phone.description: The phone number of the buyer

CompanyName.description: The company name of the buyer

VatID.description: The company VAT identifier of the buyer (CVR, SE, VAT)

OrderBuyer.description: Represents the company or individual purchasing the order

OrderProduct.title: Product (Order)

Token.description: The token used to identify a specific product.

Value.description: The value denomination that you want to order. Must be specified in minor units (i.e. $5.00 should be sent as 500)

Quantity.description: The amount of codes you are ordering

Expires.description: An optional time and date for the giftcards to expire. If omitted, the default expiration will be used, and the value cannot exceed the default expiration.

OrderProduct.description: An object containing information about a product

Email.description: The email address of the recipient (required if DeliveryMethod is set to Email)

Phone.description: The phone number of the recipient (required if DeliveryMethod is set to SMS)

RefID.description: An optional ID that you can use to identify the individual recipient with later.

OrderRequest.title: Order Request

DeliveryMethod.description: The method used to deliver the codes (SMS, Email, None)

RefID.description: An optional ID that you can use to identify the resulting order with

PersonalMessage.description: An optional message to include in all the SMS/Emails (if applicable)

TemplateID.description: The ID of the Template to use for SMS/Email (if applicable). Can be omitted if the default templates are set in the B2B administration interface.

DeliveryDatetime.description: An optional future date for delivery to take place, if null delivery will happen as soon as possible

Recipients.description: A list of all the receivers. It is required unless DeliveryMethod is set to None. If specified, the count must be either 1 or match Product.Quantity

OrderRequest.description: An object containing all the necessary information for ordering giftcards

OrderUID.description: A unique ID which will be connected to the resulting order. You can use this to identify the incoming callback.

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

OrderStatus.title: Order Cancel Status

OrderID.description: The ID of the given Order

Cancelled.description: Reflects whether or not the order was Cancelled or not.

Message.description: Message describing the action taken regarding the given order

OrderStatus.description: Object describing the outcome of an Order Cancel.

OrderSyncProduct.title: Product (Sync Order)

Token.description: The token used to identify a specific product.

Value.description: The value denomination that you want to order. Must be specified in minor units (i.e. $5.00 should be sent as 500)

Expires.description: An optional time and date for the giftcards to expire. If omitted, the default expiration will be used, and the value cannot exceed the default expiration.

OrderSyncProduct.description: An object containing information about a product

OrderSyncRequest.title: Order Request

RefID.description: An optional ID that you can use to identify the resulting order with

OrderSyncRequest.description: An object containing all the necessary information for ordering giftcards

OrderSyncResponse.title: Order (Order Callback)

OrderUID.description: A unique ID which will be connected to the resulting order. You can use this to identify the incoming callback.

ID.description: The unique identifier of the order (used by resend and cancel endpoints)

UID.description: A value used to verify the authenticity of the order (if applicable)

RefID.description: The optional ID that you specified in the order request.

Vouchers.description: The resulting vouchers for the placed order.

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

OrderSyncResponse.description: An object containing the order information returned by the callback

OrderSyncResponse_Voucher.title: Voucher (Order Callback)

ID.description: The unique identifier of the voucher (used by resend and cancel endpoints)

Code.description: The redeemable code of the voucher. (This will be blanked unless IncludeCodes is enabled in your Callback)

CVV.description: A value used to verify the authenticity of the voucher (if applicable)

RedeemLink.description: The URL to redeem the voucher

Expires.description: The time and date for when the voucher expires

OrderSyncResponse_Voucher.description: An object containing the voucher information returned by the callback

ResendRequest.title: Resend Request

OrderID.description: The OrderID for the giftcards that you want to Resend.

VoucherID.description: The ID of the specific Voucher that you want to resend.

Receiver.description: An optional email address or phone number in case you need to change the recipient, leave as null to resend to the original recipient.

ResendRequest.description: An object containing all the necessary information for resending a giftcard

ResendResponse.title: Resend Response

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

ResendResponse.description: The response from a Resend request

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

Response.description: The minimal possible response for any request.

SearchBuyer.title: Buyer (Search)

Email.description: The e-mail address of the buyer

Number.description: The phone number of the buyer

RefID.description: An optional internal reference to an order in your own system

TransactionID.description: The ID from the successful money transaction

IP.description: The IP address of the request

SearchBuyer.description: Object containing information about the buyer

SearchDeliveryMethods.title: Delivery Method (Search)
SearchDeliveryMethods.description: The different ways an order can be delivered

SearchProduct.title: Product (Search)

Token.description: The token that identifies the product to be sent out (If specified, the GenerateGiftcard and GeneratedGiftcardValue options are ignored).

SearchProduct.description: An object containing information about a product

SearchReceiver.title: Receiver (Search)

NameOrCompanyName.description: Name of the receiver (either person or company)

CareOfOrAttention.description: An optional "c/o" or "att:" for the receiver address

Email.description: The e-mail address of the receiver (Required if sending via e-mail)

Number.description: The phone number of the receiver (Required if sending via SMS)

Address.description: The postal address of the receiver (Required if sending via Postal)

MessengerID.description: The messenger id of the receiver (Required if sending via facebook)

Zipcode.description: The postal code (not necessarily ZIP) for the address of the receiver (Required if sending via Postal)

City.description: The city name for the address of the receiver (Required if sending via Postal)

Message.description: A personal message to be included with the giftcard

DeliveryDatetime.description: An optional future date for delivery to take place

SearchReceiver.description: Object containing information about a receiver

SearchRequest.title: Search Request

From.description: The earliest time and date to include in search

To.description: The latest time and date to include in search

ResultsPerPage.description: The amount of results to include per page (only accepts 1 to 100, default is 25)

PageNumber.description: The page index of results that you want to return (1-indexed)

SearchRequest.description: An object containing all the informations you can search for

Vouchers.description: The list of the matching vouchers

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

SearchVoucher.title: Voucher (Search)

ID.description: The unique identifier of the voucher (required to show code in output)

Code.description: The redeemable code of the voucher

RedeemLink.description: The URL to redeem the voucher

Created.description: The time and date for when the voucher was added

Used.description: The time and date for when the voucher was used

Expires.description: The time and date for when the voucher expires

CVV.description: A value used to verify the authenticity of the voucher (if applicable)

SearchVoucher.description: An object containing information about a voucher

StockRequest.title: Stock Request

ProductToken.description: The unique token for the product you want to get stock information for

Value.description: The value to check availability for. Defaults to the default price for the product if value is null.

Currency.description: The currency to check availability for. Defaults to the default currency for the product if value is null.

StockRequest.description: An object containing the required input for the stock API

StockResponse.title: Stock Response

Active.description: Indicates if it is currently possible to order the product or not.

Stock.description: The full count of giftcards found

Message.description: Error message describing an error that occured during the processing of the request

StockResponse.description: The response containing stock information for a product

VoucherStatus.title: Voucher Cancel Status

VoucherID.description: The ID of the a specific Voucher in the given Order.

Cancelled.description: Reflects whether or not a specific Voucher was Cancelled or not.

Message.description: Message describing the action taken regarding a specific Voucher

VoucherStatus.description: Object describing the outcome of an Voucher Cancel.

ApiToken.description: The API-Token provided to you by Huuray.
ApiToken.name: X-API-TOKEN
